name: CHIPS Incentives Program
objective: The CHIPS Incentives Program aims to catalyze long-term economically sustainable growth in the domestic semiconductor industry in support of U.S. economic  and national security.
sub_agency_name: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
assistance_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
